reasoning: Mediastinal lymphomas include primary mediastinal B-cell lymphoma (~0.4 per 100k) and Hodgkin lymphoma with mediastinal involvement (~1.1 per 100k). Combined estimate ~1.5 per 100k based on lymphoma registry data.
source: Lones MA et al. (2000). Primary mediastinal B-cell lymphoma: epidemiology and clinical features. Curr Opin Oncol. 12(5):462-8
